column2: Bazi rezveHutano Rinoti neSvondo Hakuna Akafa neCovid-19 Uye Vatanhatu Chete Ndivo Vakabatwa neChirwere Ichi
column3: Bazi rezvehutano rinoti vanhu vatanhatu chete ndivo vabatwa nechirwere cheCovid-19 munyika yose pavanhu vanodarika mazana matanhatu nevaviri kana 602 vavhenekwa uye hapana kana mumwe chete akafa. Vanhu vakabatwa nechirwere cheCovid-19 ava vose havana nhoroondo yekumboshanya kunze kwenyika. Izvi zvave kureva kuti huwandu hwevanhu vabatwa nechirwere ichi hwasvika pazviuri zvitanhatu zvine mazana mana negumi nevaviri kana kuti 6,412. Huwandu hwevanhu vafa nechirwere cheCovid-19 munyika huchiri pazana nemakumi mapfumbamwe nevatanhatu kana kuti 196. Vanhu vapora vanosvika zviuru zvishanu zvine makumi matanhatu nemumwe kana kuti 5, 061 zvichitevera kupora kwevanhu vashanu kuMashonaland East. Dzimwe nyanzvi munyaya dzezvehutano nehama dzevafi dzinoti vamwe vanhu vari kufa vangadai vasiri kufa dai vashandi vemuzvipatara kusanganisira vakoti navanachiremba vasiri kuramwa mabasa. Mutevedzeri wemutungamiri wenyika vari gurukota rezvehutano VaConstantino Chiwenga vari kukurudzira vashandi ava kuti vadzokere kumabasa zvichemo zvavo zvichizeyiwa asi zvinenge zvakona n’anga murapwa achida. Sachigaro weHealth Services Board Dr Paulinus Sikosana vatendawo kuStudio 7 kuti hapana chati chafamba muhurongwa hwekuti vashandi mubazi rezvehutano vadzoke kumabasa. Mutungamiri wesangano revakoti reZimbabwe Nurses Association VaEnoch Dongo vanoti havasi kuzodzokera kumabasa kusvika zvichemo zvavo zvagadziriswa. No media source currently available Zvichakadaro, mashoko atumirwa studio 7 neAfrican Union achibva kuAfrica Centers for Disease Control and Prevention anoratidza kuti vanhu miriyoni imwe chete nezviuru mazana maviri kana kuti 1, 2 million vabatwa nechirwere ichi muAfrica. Vafa vasvika zviuru zviri nemakumi mapfumbamwe nemazana mana nemakumi matatu kana kuti 29, 430. Vapora vave kuda kusvika zviuru mazana mapfumbamwe zvine makumi matanhau nemapfumbamwe kana kuti 969, 000. Huwandu hwevanhu vabatwa nechirwere checoronavirus pasi rose hwadarika mamiriyoni makumi maviri nemashanu kana kuti 25 million.  Johns Hopkins University yemuAmerica iyo iri kuongorora kupararira kwechirwere ichi pasi rose inoti muAmerica ndimo mune vanhu vakawandisa vabatwa nekufa nechirwere ichi. Vanhu vafa nechirwere ichi muAmerica vadarika zviuru zana ne makumi masere nemaviri kana kuti 182,000. Vafa pasi rose vachidarika zviuru mazana masere zvine makumi mana nematatu kana kuti 843, 000. Vapora vachidarika mamiriyoni gumi nematanhatu nezviuru mazana mana kana kuti 16, 4 million.

column2: Amnesty International Yosimbaradza Kodzero dzeVavhoti Musarudzo
column3: Sangano reAmnesty International raparura gwaro rezvekodzero dzevanhu rarinoda kuti ritevedzwe nemapato ezvematongerwo enyika kuitira kuti nyika iite sarudzo dzakachena pamwe nekuti munyika muve netsika yekuremekedza kodzero dzevanhu. Chipangamazano chikuru muAmnesty International kudunhu reSouthern Africa, VaLlyod Kuvheya, vanoti zvinhu izvi zvinosanganisira kunyangaritswa kwevanhu, kuremekedza kodzero dzevanhukadzi nevanasikana nezvimwe, zvikaitwa nyika inoita sarudzo dzakachena. Zvimwewo zvinodiwa neAmnesty International kuti mapato, hurumende nevari kukwikwidza vaiite kuti mapurisa nemauto vamirire kushungurudza vanhu, kumira kubvisa vanhu nechisimba kubva munzvimbo dzavanogara, kupa vanhu mukana wekutaura zvavanoda pamwe nekuremekedza kodzero dzevatori venhau. Vatiwo nyika inofanirwa kutevedza zviga zvese zvekucherechedza kodzero dzevanhu zvakaita seAfrican Charter on Human and People’s Rights. Munyori muZimbabwe Human Rights Commission, Doctor Makanatsa Makonese, vati gwaro raparurwa nhasi rakakosha chose sezvo pasina chinofamba munyika kana pasingaremekedzwi kodzeo dzevanhu. Vati zvakakosha kuti vese vemapato ezvematongerwo enyika vaise kodzero dzevanhu pamberi apo vanenge vachitsvaga rutsigiro kubva kubva kuvanhu. Sachigaro veZimbabwe Election Support Network, VaAndrew Makoni, vaudza Studio7 kuti zvakakosha kuti Zimbabwe iite sarudzo dzakachena kuti nyika ifambire mberi. Vakuvheya vati gwaro iri richapihwa kumapato ese ari kupinda musarudzo, mapurisa, masoja nevese vane chekuita nesarudzo sezvo vachida kuti nyika iite sarudzo dzakasiyana nesarudzo dzakadarika idzo dzaiita mutauro nekuda kwekupondwa, kurohwa nekutyorwa kwekodzeo dzevanhu. Zimbabwe ichaita sarudzo kupera kwemwedzi uno uye vemasangano anoshanda akazvimirira vanoti mamirira akaita zvinhu pari zvino zvinoratidza sekuti sarudzo idzi dzichange dziri nani panyaya yekutyorwa kwekodzero dzevanhu. No media source currently available

column2: Varwere Voshaya Vanovabatsira Muzvipatara Zvikuru zveHurumende
column3: Zvinhu zvave kuramba zvichiita manyama amire nerongo muzvipatara zvikuru muguta reBulawayo mushure mekunge vana mukoti nevamwe vashandi vemuzvipatara vatangawo kuramwa mabasa senzira yekupa rutsigiro kuna vanachiremba vave nemasvondo maviri vachiramwa mabasa. Studio 7 payasvika pachipatara cheMpilo Central Hospital yawana panzvimbo dzinorapirwa vanhu vanobva kumba kana kuti Outpatient Department pamwe neCasualty Department paine vanhu vashoma zvikuru. Vanhu vazoudzwa kunzi vadzokere kudzimba dzavo mushure mekunge vana mukoti nevamwe vashandi vehurumende vaita musangano apo vatora chisungo chekutanga kuramwawo mabasa senzira yekutsigira vana chiremba avo vakatanga kuramwa mabasa masvondo maviri apfuura. Mumwe murume asina kuda kudomwa nezita ati kubva nemusi weMuvhuro ange achiuya nababa vake kuti vazoongororwa navana chiremba paMpilo asi vasingawane rubatsiro. Murume uyu ati hurumende inofanirwa kugadzirisa zvichemo zvavana chiremba nevamwe vashandi vemuzvipatara. Muzvare Dorcas Mpofu avo vange vaperekedza sekuru vavo kuti vazorapwawo paMpilo vati havachaziva zvekuita vakatsinhirawo kuti dai hurumende yaona zvaingaita. Mukuru waana chiremba paMpilo Hospital, Dr Solwayo Ngwenya, vati chimwe chikamu chishoma chavanachiremba chakauya kubasa asi vabvuma kuti vana chiremba pamwe nevamwe vashandi vemuzvipatara havazi kufara uye vakawanda vavo havana kuuya kubasa nemusi weChitatu zvekuti zvinhu zvikaramba zvakadaro, hupenyu hweveruzhinji hunenge hwave munjodzi. Pamashoko ari kubuda mumapepanhau ehurumende ekuti hurumende iri kuunza vana chiremba vemuchiuto muzvipatara, Dr Ngwenya vati havasati vanzwa nezvavo. Sangano reZimbabwe Nurses Association rakaita musangano nezuro muHarare pamwe nemasangano anomirira vashandi vemuzvipatara, vakatora danho rekutangawo kuramwa mabasa kutanga nhasi. Mamiriro ezvhinhu paUnited Bulawayo Hospitals ange ari mamwe chete vana chiremba vakawanda vasiri pabasa uye vanoziva zviri kuitika vaudza Studio 7 kuti vana mukoti vakawanda vange vasiri pabasa. Mumwe murume wechikuru, VaMabuku Ndlovu, avo vange vauya kuti vazoonekwa nachiremba paUBH vati vaudzwa kuti havakwanise kuonekwa nekuti vana chiremba vange vasiri pabasa. Mukuru wavana chiremba pachipatara ichi, Dr Narcisius Dzvanga, vati havakwanise kutaura nesu sezvo vange vari mumusangano. Vana chiremba vakawedzera kuramwa kwavo mabasa zvichitevera kupambwa kwakaita Dr Peter Magombeyi avo vange vakafanobata chigaro chemutungamiri wesangano reZimbabwe Hospital Doctors Association. No media source currently available

column2: Chikwata cheIMF Chinopeta Rwendo kuZimbabwe Chichirumbidza Mabatirwo eHupfumi, Asi Chichiti Haisati Yave Kukodzera Kupiwa Rubatsiro Rwemari
column3: Chikwata che International Monetary Fund (IMF) chichitungamirirwa naVaDhaneshwar Ghura, neMuvhuro chakapeta rwendo rwacho rwemazuva masere muZimbabwe, umo chaiita hurukuro nevakuru vehurumende, vakuru vebhanga guru renyika pamwe nevemabhizimusi pamusoro peshanduko dziri kuitika mune zvehupfumi pamwe nemamiriro ahwo. Mugwaro ravakaburitsa mushure mekupeta rwendo urwu, VaGhura vakati hupfumi hweZimbabwe hwaratidza kusimba kukuru nekumuka kwahwo munguva yakaoma. Vakati hondo iri pakati peRussia neUkraine, kusanaya zvakanaka kwemvura pamwe nemitengo yezvinhu iri pamusoro zviri kukanganisa hupfumi nemagariro evanhu muZimbabwe, izvo zvakasakadzwa kare nedenda reCovid-19. IMF yakapembedzawo matanho ari kuitwa nehurumende ekudzikamisa mutengo wemari yekunze, asi ichitiwo panodiwa mamwe matanho ekunyatsodzikamisa hupfumi ane hupenyu hunoenda mberi. Kunyange hazvo Zimbabwe yakapembedzwa neIMF nekukwanisa kubhadhara chikwereti chayo kuIMF muna 2016, sangano rinokweretsa mari iri rakati haisati yasvika pakuti ikwanise kupiwa rubatsiro rwemari nekuda kwekukundikana kubhadra kwayo zvikwereti zvayo zvekunze. Nyanzvi mune zvehupfumi pamwe nekudyidzana kwenyika dzepasi rose, Muzvinafundo Elliot Masocha, vanoti zvinofadza chose kuti IMF yakarumbidza Zimbabwe nematanho ayakatora ekukwanisa kuraramisa hupfumi hwenyika, panguva iyo dzimwe nyika pasi rose dzaitarisana nematambudziko aitosvitsa pakubviswa kwevatungamiri pazvigaro. Asi Muzvinafundo Masocha vanoti havaoni hurumende ichibudirira kuzdzisa zvayakakomekedzwa kuti izadzise nekuti zvinhu zvave nemakore ichiudzwa nezvazvo asi isina matanho ainotora. No media source currently available

column2: Zviri kuramba: Dynamos…l Tinoda kuhwinha: Lodza , Zviri kutivhara: Mubaiwa ,Bhadharai vapfanha: Romario
column3: MUTUNGAMIRIRI weDynamos FC, Kenias “Kenny” Mubaiwa, anoti vari kuzama nepavanogona kuti chikwata chavo chihwinhe mitambo yacho yemuPremier Soccer League asi zviri kukona n’anga murapwa achida.   Kubva mumitambo minomwe yatambwa neDeMbare, haisati yahwina kana mumwe zvawo sezvo yakwanisa kuita mangange mitatu ndokukundwa mina izvo zviri kuona iri imwe yezvikwata zvakasenga zviri pasi pelog. Mubaiwa anoti chikwata chavo chinotambira kuhwina asi zviri kurambawo mwaka uno uye havazive kuti chii chiri kumbonetsa.   “Isu chedu chatinoziva ndechekuti tiri kuedza nepatinogona kuti tirwe, tihwine asi zviri kuramba. Tinogadzirira mitambo yese uye topinda tichida kuhwina asi zviri kuramba, hatipinde mumutambo kuzokundwa, asi kuhwina,” anodaro.

column2: Ndasuwa nhabvu: Antipas
column3: MURAIRIDZI weChicken Inn, Joey “Mafero” Antipas, anoti asuwa zvikuru mutambo wenhabvu uye kuramba akagara pamba nekuda kwechirwere cheCovid-19 kwakurwadza asi ajaira sezvo zvichibatsira hupenyu hwake nehwevakawanda.   Mafero — uyo akatungamira maGamecocks kuhwina mukombe weCastle Premiership mugore ra2015 — anoti kugara asingarairidze mutambo waanodisisa uye kuuona kwakaoma asi vanhu vanofanirwa kugara mudzimba kuti vange vakachengetedzeka.   “Ndasuwa mutambo wedu asi iye zvino chakakosha kunge takachengetedzeka kuti coronavirus isarambe ichipararira.   “Ngatitevedzere zvinodiwa chete, ini ndiri mumba mangu uye handisi kumbobuda,” anodaro Mafero.   Ari mamwe makore, mitambo yePSL ingadai yakatanga asi yakambomiswa nekuda kweCovid-19 senzira yekuti vanhu vasaungane uye kuti chirwere ichi chisapararire pakati pevanhu.   Antipas anoti mwedzi miviri mutambi asingatambe nhabvu yakawandisa chaizvo saka ari kukurudzira vatambi vake kuti vange vachiita gadziriro vari kudzimba dzavo nekuti hapana anoziva kuti mitambo inotanga rinhi.   “Vatambi venhabvu vanofanirwa kukoshesa miviri yavo saka tiri kutovakurudzira kuti vari kudzimba dzavo vambomhanya uye kuita gadziriro dzakasiyana. Chirwere ichi chatidzidzisa kuti tinofanirwa kufamba nezviripo,” anodaro.

column2: Dare raMejastiriti Robvumidza Crisis in Zimbabwe Coalition Kuratidzira Mushure Mekumborambidzwa neMapurisa
column3: Dare ramejasiatiriti muHarare nemusi weMuvhuro rakatura mutongo wekubvumidza sangano reCrisis In Zimbabwe Coalition kuti riratidzire kusafara kwaro nekunonoka kuri kuitwa nehurumende kuvandudza mitemo inobata sarudzo munyika. Mutongi wedare ramejasitiriti VaLanzini Ncube vakatura mutongo wekuti sangano reCrisis In Zimbabwe Coalition rienderere mberi nehurongwa hwaro hwekuratidzira muHarare neChitatu mushure mekunge sangano iri rarambidzwa nemapurisa kuratidzira richinzi rinozokanganisa runyararo muguta. Mutongi wedare ati kuratidzira uku kuri kuenderere mberi vachiti bumbiro remitemo rinobvumidza vanhu kuratidzira uye mapurisa haafanire kufungidzira kuti vanhu vachapara mhosva ivo vasina chokwadi nazvo. Sangano reCrisis in Zimbabwe Coalition rakarambidzwa kufora muHarare nemapurisa mushure mekuvazivisa kuti nhengo dzaro dzichazofora dzichiratidza kusafara kwadzo nekunonoka kuri kuita hurumende kuvandudza mitemo inobata sarudzo. Sangano iri rinoti mitemo yesarudzo inofanira kuvandudzwa kuitira kuti iringane nebumbiro idzva renyika pamwe nezviga zvinobata nyaya dzesarudzo zvakatarwa nesangano renyika dziri kuchamhembe kweAfrica re SADC kana kuti SADC Principles Governing the Conduct of Democratic Elections. Mutauriri weCrisis in Zimbabwe Coalition, VaThabani Moyo vanoti vafara zvikuru nemutongo waturwa nedare. Zvichakadaro, imwe nyanzvi munyaya dzezvematongerwo enyika uye vachishanda vakazvimirira VaDavid Nyamanhindi vaudza Studio 7 kuti zviri kuitwa nemapurisa zvekurambidza misangano izvi zvinhu zvagara zvino zivikanwa kuti ndizvo zvavanoita pose panenge pave kuendwa kusarudzo vachiti mapurisa haafanire kuve nedivi raanorerekera. Zvichakadaro, mutongi wedare uyu audza mapurisa kuti achengetedze nhengo dzeCrisis in Zimbabwe Coalition padzichange dzichifora muHarare neChitatu. No media source currently available

column2: Buy Zimbabwe Yokurudzira Vanhu Kutenga Zvinogadzirwa muNyika
column3:
Panguva yezororo reKisimisi negore idzva munyika munopindazvinhu zvakawanda zvakasiyana siyana zvinotengwa kubva kunze. Sangano reBuy Zimbabwe rinoti nyika inrasikirwa nemari yekunze yakawanda uye maindasitiri emuno anotadza kusimukira nekuda kwekutengwa kubva kunze kwenyika kwezvinhu zvinogona kugadzirwa muno. Nekudaro sangano iri riri kukurudzira kuti veruzhinji vafarire kutenga zvinhu zvinogadzirwa munyika

Mukuru wesangano reBuy Zimbabwe VaAlois Burutsa vanoti zvakakoshera nyika kuti veruzhinji vatenge zvinhu zvinogadzirwa munyika kuitira kubatsira kuchengetedza mari yekunze iyo inogona kushandiswa pakutenga zvimwe zvakaksoha zvisingagadzirwe muno zvakadai semichina.

VaBurutsa vaudza Studio 7 kuti kubvira zvakatanga sangano ravo muna2011 vanofara kuti chinangwa chavo chabatsira kusimudzira kutengwa kwezvigadzirwa zvemuno munyika. Zimbabwe inoshandisa mari yakawanda gore rega rega mukutenga zvinhu kubva kunze kwenyika. Gore rakapera nyika yakashandisa mabhiriyoni manomwe nemamiriyoni mazana matanhatu kana kuti 7.6 billion zvichienzaniswa ne4.6 billion yakashandiswa muna2020.

Zvimwe zvezvinhu zvinonyanya kutengwa kunze zvinosanganisira mafuta edzimotokari, mafetireza, nemichina asi pane zvimwewo zvakawanda zvinogadzirwa muno zvinobvawo kunze.

Mutungamiri wesangano reConfederation of Zimbabwe Industries VaKurai Matsheza vatsinhirawo kuti zvakakosha kuti veruzhinji vafarire kutenga zvinhu zvinogadzirwa muno vachiti izvi zvinobatsirawo kuti munyika muve nemabasa.

CZI inoti pari zvino maindasitiri emunyika ari kushanda zvinosvika pazvikamu makumi manomwe kubva muzana uye kushomeka kwemagetsi nderimwe dambudziko guru rinoita kuti asashanda nemazvo.

VaBurutsa vanopokana nemaonero ekuti zvnhu zvakawanda zvinogadzirwa munyika zvinodhura uye hazvinyatsogadzirwa nemhando yepamusoro sezvinoita zvinobva kunze.

VaFelix Chari, mudzidzisi wezvidzidzo zvepamusoro panyaya yezvehupfumi vanoti vanobvumirana nemaonero ekuti zvinhu zvakawanda zvinogadzirwa munyika zvinodhura vachiti izvi zvinoitika nekuda kwezvikonzero zvakawanda. Nyanzvi munyaya dzezvehupfumi vaachishanda nesangano relabour and Economic Developmemt Research Institute of Zimbabwe Dr Prosper Chitambara vatiwo chirongwa cheBuy Zimbabwe chakanaka asi zvimwe zvinogadzirwa zvinozodhura sezvo kugadzira zvinhu munyika kuchidhura. Vachitaura pakuparurwa kwevhiki rekukurudzira kutengwa kwezvinhu zvinogadzirwa muno muHarare nezuro, mutungamirir wenyika VaEmmerson Mnangagwa vakati hurumende inotsigira chirongwa ichi nekuti chinobatsira kudzivirira kuunzwa munyika kwezvinhu zvinogadzirwa kunze
zvinenge zvine mutengo wakadereresa izvo vakati zvinokanganisa budiriro yenyika.  Zvitoro zvikuru zvinosanganisira OK Zimbabwe zvirimowo muchirongwa cheBuy Zimbabwe ichi. Zimbabwe inonyanya kutenga nekutengesearana neSouth Africa, China, United Araba Emirates, Singapore, United Kingdom neRussia. Asi dzimwe nyanzvi munyaya dzedzvehupfumi dzinoti VaMnangagwa vanotaura zvinhu zvisiri kuitwa nehurumende. Semuenzaniso, mushure mekunge zvigadziraw zvemunyika zvawedzerwa mutengo nekuda kwekushaya simba kwedhora remunyika, gurukota rezvemari Muzvinafundo Mthuli Ncube vakabva vabvumidza vezvitoro kutenga zvinhu kunze pasina kubhadhara mitero.

column2: Vanhu Vashanu Vanofa Zvichitevera Mhirizhonga Iri Kuitika muSouth Africa
column3: Mapurisa emu South Africa ashandisa zvombo zvemabara asingauraye senzira yekuti vanhu vanga vachiratidzira mumigwagwa yeAlexandria, vaparare. Vanhu ava vanga vachiratidzira vachiti havadi kuti zvizvarwa zvedzimwe nyika zvinge zvichigara nekushanda munyika iyi. Zvinonzi vanhu vashanu vafa mumhirizhonga iyi, uye vanhu vanodarika zana vasungwa munyika yose vachipomerwa mhosva yekukonzera mhirizhonga. Mutungamiri we South Africa, VaCyril Ramaphosa, vashora zvikuru mhizhonga iri kuitika munyika mavo, vakati vachaita musangano negurukota rezvemapurisa, Va Bheki Cele, kuti patsvagwe nzira dzekugadzirisa dambudziko iri. Va Cele vabvuma kuti kune vanhu vashanu vafa mumhirizhonga iyi. Mumiriri we Zimbabwe mu South Africa, Va David Hamadziripi, vati havana ruzivo kana pavanhu vafa ava, pane zvizvarwa zveZimbabwe here kana kuti kwete. Asi vavimbisa kuti vachaunganidza zvavanenge vawana vozivisa veruzhinji. VaRamaphosa vati zviri kuitwa nezvizvarwa zve South Africa zvekurwisa nekushungurudza vabvakure, hazvisi zvinhu zvinokurudzurwa kuitwa. Vati izvi zvinofanirwa kumiswa izvozvi, vachiti vanhu vemuSouth Africa vanogara kugara murunyararo. Zvitoro zvevanhu vanobva kunze kwe South Africa zvakapwanywa kana kupiswa mudunhu reGauteng. Ukuwu mutungamiri wedunhu re Gauteng, Va David Makhura, vashanyira musha weAlexandria neChipiri masikati vachiona kuparadzwa kwakaitwa zvitoro. VaMakhura vakurudzira kuti mudunhu ravo muve nekugadzikana. Zvichakadaro, gurukota rezvekudzivirirwa kweSouth Africa, Amai Nosiviwe Mapisa Nqakula, vati kuparadzwa kwezvitoro kwakanangana nekuzvibisa chimiro cheSouth Africa. Mhirizhonga iyi inonzi yakatanga ku Tshwane svondo rapera, isati yapararira mu Johannesburg nenzvimbo dzakapoteredza guta iri. Sachigaro weZimbabwe Exiles Forum, VaGabriel Shumba, vanoti vanhu vana varasikirwa nehupenyu pamusoro pevatatu vakashaya nemusi weMuvhuro, asi havazivi kuti vanhu vangani vanobva kuZimbabwe vangave vakabatwa nemhirizhonga iri. VaShumba varatidzawo kushungurudzika nemaitiro emhuri yeZimbabwe iri muSouth Africa, iyo vati haina kubatana izvo zviri kupa kuti masangano anomirira zvizvarwa zveZimbabwe atadze kuve neruzivo pane zvirizvarwa zveZimbabwe zvinogona kunge zviri kuvhiringwa nemhirizhonga iyi. VaShumba vakurudzira mhuri yeZimbabwe iri muSouth Africa kuti itumidzire padandemutare reZEF, kana vachinge vasangana netsaona munguva yemhirizhonga iyi. Mukuru wesangano rinomiririra mabhizimisi emhuri yeZimbabwe mu South Africa, reProudly 263, VaStan Makwara, vanoti vanoshungurudzika nezviri zvikuru bezviri kuitika muSouth Africa sezvo zvichivhiringidza mabhizinesi pakati peZimbabwe neSouth Africa. VaMakwara vaenderera mberi vachiti vari mubishi kuzivisa nhengo dzavo nzvimbo dziri kuitika mhirizhonga iyi kuitira kuti vagare vari kure. Vatiwo sangano ravo riri kushanda nemuzinda weZimbabwe muSouth Africa pachitsvagwa nzira dzekupedza dambudziko iri. Zvichakadaro, kune gwaro raburitswa riri kukurudzira zvizvarwa zvekunze, kuti zviratidzire mangwana, pamusangano we World Economic Forum on Africa, uyo uri kutanga nemusi weChitatu muguta reCape Town. Ratidziro iyi, ichange iri yekukurudzira vatungamiriri venyika dzemuAfrica vachange vari pamusangano uyu, kuti vatore matanho akaomara kunyika yeSouth Africa nekutadza kwayo kwairi kuita kuremeredza kodzero dzevanobva kunze kwenyika iyi. Mutungamiri wenyika, VaEmmerson Mnangagwa, vatove muCape Town kuti vazopinda mumusangano uyu. No media source currently available

column2: Vatsigiri vava kutenderwa munhandare
column3: VATSIGIRI venhabvu vakabaiwa majekiseni ose ekudzivirira Covid-19 vave kutenderwa kuona mitambo yeChibuku Super Cup. Sangano reSports and Recreation Commission (SRC) rakanyorera kuZimbabwe Football Association (Zifa) richazivisa kuti chikumbiro chavo chekuti mitambo yeChibuku Super Cup inge iine vatsigiri 2 000 munhandare chatambirwa.   Mutsamba yakanyorwa neSRC, akafanobata chigaro chadirector general – Sebastain Garikai – anoti vatsigiri 2 000 vachaona mitambo iyi vanofanirwa kunge vakabaiwa nhomba dzeCovid-19 uye pose pavanoenda kumitambo iyi vagare vakapfeka mamasiki nekutevedzera matanho ose ekudzivirira kupararira kwechirwere ichi.   “Chikumbiro chenyu chekuti vatsigiri vaone nhabvu vari munhandare chatambirwa. Saka vatsigiri vose vari muZone 3 neZone 4 vanofanirwa kuuya nemakadhi anoratidza kuti vakabaiwa majekiseni ose eCovid-19 pamwe nezvitupa zvavo kunhandare pavanenge vachipinda. “Naizvozvo, tinokurudzira kuti matikiti ekupinda mumitambo iyi atengeswe mitambo isati yatanga kuitira panhandare pasazoita nyonga-nyonga uye tinotarisira kuti pave nemagedhi akasiyana anopinda nekubuda nevanhu.   “Mazita evatsigiri aya anofanirwa kunge akatonyoreswa kare zvekuti pakupinda munhandare pane vanenge vachiongorora. Kana munhu zita rake risipo, haatenderwe kupinda munhandare macho.   “Mitemo iyi nemimwe ikoshesei uye ngaitevedzerwe nekuti mukasaitedzera zvinotituma kuti timise vatsigiri vacho kuuya kuzoona mitambo iyi,” anodaro Garikai.

column2: Hurumende Inoti Zvikoro Zvichavhurwa Mwedzi Uno, Varairidzi Vachiti Zvikoro Hazvina Gadziriro Yakakwana
column3: Hurumende yakazivisa neChipiri kuti zvikoro zvave kuzovhurwa muzvikamu zviviri, chikamu chekutanga musiwa 15 Kurume kuchiti chikamu chepiri chiri musi wa 22 Kurume, unove mwedzi uno. Vachitaura mushure memusangano wedare remakurukota, gurukota rezvekuburitswa kwemashoko, Amai Monica Mutsvangwa, vakati vana vari kuita zvidzidzo zvinonyorwa bvunzo gore rino zveGrade 7, Form 4 neForm 6, ndivo vachatanga kuvhura musi wa 15. Vakatiwo varairidzi vari kudzidzisa zvidzidzo zviri muchikamu chekutanga vanofanirwa kunge vave kumabasa avo musi wa 10 mwedzi uno. Amai Mutsvangwa vakati vamwe vana vese vachange vachizovhura musi wa 22 Kurume, uye varairidzi vavo vanofanirwa kunge vave kumabasa avo musi wa 17. Vakati muzvikoro munenge musina mukana wekuti vana vasiye mikaha pakati pavo, vana vachapana mukana wekudzidza nguva dzakasiyanasiyana. Asi vakafannobata chigaro chemunyori mukuru werimwe sangano revarairidzi, reZimbabwe Teachers Association, ZIMTA, VaGoodwell Taderera, vanoti hurumende inofanirwa kutanga yazadzisa matanho anokurudzirwa neWorld Health Organization pamwe nebazi rezvehutano isati yafunga zvekuvhura zvikoro. VaTaderera vanoti sesangano revashandi vanoti varairidzi vanofanirwawo zvakare kupiwa mihoro inovaita kuti vagare pamabasa, kwete zvekuti mudzidzisi anofunga zvekusiya basa ombonokorokoza. No media source currently available Asi mutauriri webazi redzidzo yepasi, VaTaungana Ndoro vakaudza Studio 7 neMuvhuro kuti bazi ravo rakagadzirira kuvhurwa kwezvikoro, uye svondo rapera vakuru vakuru vebazi ravo kusanganisira negurukota redzidzo yepasi VaCain Mathema vaishanyira zvikoro vachiona kuti zvakagadzirira zvakadii kudzivirira kupararira kweCovid-19. Vanoti zvikoro zvavakashanyira zvinosanganisira zvehurumende, zvine vana vanodzidza vachigarapo kana kuti boarding, izvo zvakamboita dambudziko reCovid-19 zvakanyanya, pamwewo nezvakazvimirira. VaNdoro vakati bazi ravo rakagudzikana nezvavakaona muzvikoro. No media source currently available

column2: Hurumende Yotenga Michina yeMuzvipatara Inodarika Miriyoni yeMadhora ekuAmerica Isingashande
column3: Komiti yeparamende inoona nezvehutano nhasi iri kutarisirwa kushanyira chipatara cheParirenyatwa kuonoona michina yakanzi navanachiremba vakuru nezuro yakatengwa nehurumende asi isiri kushanda. Michina iyi yakanotengwa kuIndia nemutevedzeri wegurukota rezvehutano VaJohn Mangwiro, avo vatiwo vakatenga michina iyi vachibatsirana nevashandi vemuzinda weZimbabwe kuIndia. Vachitaura kukomiti iyi, vanachiremba vakuru vari pasi pesangano reSenior Hospital Doctors Association kana kuti SHDA vakati zvinhu zvichiri zvakaita manyama amire nerongo muzvipatara uye hakuna michina inodiwa kuzvipatara zvehurumende kuti ibatsire varwere. Mutungamiri weSHDA Amai Shingai Nyaguse vakati pamichina yakatengwa nehurumende iyi zvikamu gumi kubva muzana chete ndiyo iri kushanda. Amai Nyaguse vatiwo kunyangwe hazvo vamiriri vekambani yekuIndia kwakatengwa michina vakazodanwa kuuya munyika kuzoigadzirisa vakakundikana. Amai Nyaguse vakatiwo pamichina iyi, mizhinji yacho yakamboshanda uye yakatengwa kukambani isingazivikanwi. Vakapawo muenzaniso wekuti mimwe mibhedha yakauya inofanirwa kushandiswa pakusununguka kwemadzimai akazvitakura yakanyorwa kuti ishandiswe nemadzimai asingaremi zvinodarika makirogiramu makumi matanhatu nemashanu, vakati madzimai mazhinji munyika anenge akazvitakura anodarika huremu uhwu. Vachitaurawo kukomiti iyi, VaMangwiro vakaramba kuti michina iyi haisi kushanda vachiti mishoma chete ndiyo ine zvimwe zvaive zvisipo asi vakati zvinhu izvi zvakazogadzirwa uye vamiriri vekambani yekuIndia kwavakatenga michina iyi vari kuuya kuzoisa zvaive zvisipo izvi kuti itange kushande. Imwe nhengo yeSHDA, Doctor Bothwell Mbuvayesango vanoti zvipatara zvinofanira kupihwa mvumo yekuzvitengera michina yazvo. Vanachiremba ava vakaudzawo komiti yeparamende iyi kuti vanhu vazhinji vari kufa nekuda kwekushaikwa kwezvikwanisiro muzvipatara zvehurumende zvinodiwa mukurapwa kwavo. Vanachiremba vakuru ava vakapawo chichemo kudare reparamende kuti ribvise bhodhi rinovamiririra reHealth Services Board iro vanoti harimiririre zvido zvavo. Asi gurukota rinoona nezvehutano VaObadiah Moyo vakati kubviswa kweHealth Services Board kunonetsa kana pasina kuvandudzwa mutemo. VaMoyo vakabvumawo kuti zvinhu zvakaparara munyaya dzehutano vachiti kugadzirisa matambudziko aya kunoda mari yekunze iyo hurumende isina. Komiti inoona nezvehutano iyi yatiwo nhasi ichaenda kunozvionera pamhuno sefodya kuzvipatara zveParireyyatwa pamwe neSally Mugabe kuti zvinhu zvakamira sei chaizvo munyaya dzezvehutano, sezvo pasina kuwirirana nezvekuti michina iyi iri kushanda here kana kuti kwete. No media source currently available

column2: Vatyairi veMarori vemuZimbabwe Vochema Chema Nekumanikidzwa Kushandisa Zambuko reKazungula
column3: Zvimwe zvarwa zveZimbabwe zvino gara muSouth Africa zvichityaira marori zvatotanga kuchema chema nenyaya yekumanikidzwa kushandisa zambuko reKazungula nekuregedza kushandisa muganhu weBeitbridge. VaRight Moyo, mumwe wevatyairi ava, uyewo vakamirira sangano reZimbabwe All Truckers Association, vanoti kusadarika nemuZimbabwe vari pabasa kwave kupa kuti vatadze kuonana nehama dzavo uye kutakura zvinhu zvekutengesa zvinodiwa kuZiVambabwe kuti vawanewo chouviri. Asi mumwewo mutyairi asina kuda kudomwa nezita ati hapana chakaipa kushandisa , izvi zvichayamura makambani emarori akawanda sezvo mafuta anoshandiswa nemarori, akachipa muBotswana. Vanoongorora nyaya dzezvehupfumi VaMasimba Kuchera, vanoti danho iri richakanginisa zvikuru mhuri yeZimbabwe inoita zvekutenga nekutengesa pakati peZimbawe ne South Africa. VaKuchera vati nyika yeZimbabwe icharasikirwa zvikuru nehupfumi kuburikidza nemitero naizvozvo inofanira kugadzirisa mamiriro emuganhu weBeitbridge kana ichida kukwikwidzana nezambuko reKazungula. VaStan Makwara, sachigaro weProudly 263, sangano rinosimudzira zvizvarwa zveZimbabwe zvine mabhisimisi achiri kusimukira muSouth Africa, vanoti nhengo dzavo ndidzo dzicharasikirwa zvikuru nedanho iri. Zambuko reKazungula rakavakwa neBotswana neZambia dzichibatsirwa nezvikwereti kubva kuAfrican Development Bank neJapan International Cooperation Agency. No media source currently available

column2: Hurumende Inomisa Chirongwa Chekupa Vadzidzi Zvitupa neNyaya yeCovid-19
column3: Kunyange hazvo hurumende yakamisa neMugovera chirongwa chekuti vana vanoda kunyora bvunzo dzeOrdinary neAdvanced Level vatore zvitupa nekuda kwekutyira kupararira kweCovid-19, nyanzvi munyaya dzedzidzo dzinoti zvakakosha kuti chirongwa ichi chienderere mberi kuitira kuti pasaita nhubu dzinonyorera vamwe mazamanishoni. Hurumende yainge yaisa parutivi zuro nanhasi semazuva maviri ekuti vaya vanoda kunyora bvunzo gore rino vatore zvitupa, asi yakazomisa chirongwa ichi chave pakati nezuro masikati yave kutyira kuti denda reCovid-19 ringapararire zvakanyanya mushure mekunge vanhu vabuda zvine mutsindo. Bazi rezvemukati menyika pamwe nevakafanobata chigaro chaRegistrar-General, VaHenry Machiri, vakazivisa nezuro kuti vakamisa chirongwa ichi mushure mekunge vanhu vakawandisa vaenda kumahofisi avo kunotorerwa zvitupa. Mapurisa akatozoshevedzwa kuzochengetedza runyararo uye vamwe vakanga vatorara pamahofisi aRegistrar General aya vachida zvitupa. Mumwe mudzidzi wepane chimwe chikoro muHarare, Chipo Zhou, uyo akamukira pamahofisi aRegistrar-General ari paMachipisa mumusha weHigfiled muHarare, audza Studio 7 kuti akawana paine vanhu vaidarirka chiuru vakanga vave mumutseste nechakare uye akazobva asina kutora chitupa mushure mekuudzwa kuti chirongwa ichi chaitirwa vaye vanodzidza muzvikoro zvakazvimirira kana kuti private colleges. Mumwe murairiridzi wepane chimwe chikoro mumusha weGlen View uyo aramba kudzomwa nezita, audza Studio 7 kuti ichokwadi kuti chirongwa ichi chinobata vana vanodzidza kuma private collegel. Ati vanhu vari muzvikoro zvehurumende, makunzuru kana zvemakereke havadi zvitupa kuti vanyore bvunzo. Murairidzi uyu atiwo vana vakawanda vaida zvitupa nekuti vanodzidza muzvikoro zvakazvimirira kana kuti zvisina kunyoreswa nehurumende uye zvisingabvumidzwe kunyoresa bvunzo. Nyanzvi munyaya dzedzidzo uye vari mutungamiriri wesangano rinomirira varairidzi reProgressive Teachers Union of Zimbabwe, Doctor Takavafira Zhou, vaudza Studio 7 kuti zvakakosha kuti vanoda kunyora bvunzo vasingadzidzi muzvikoro vatore zvitupa vachiti izvi zvinodzivirira hutsotsi nechikiribidi pabvunzo. Doctor Zhou, vaudza Studio 7 kuti zvinosuwisa kuti vanhu vanotambura kutora zvitupa munyika vachiti hapafaniri kuitwa zvematongerwo enyika pakutora zvitupa. Mutauriri webazi redzidzo yepasi, VaTaungana Ndoro, vanoti ichokwadi kuti vaya vasiri muzvikoro zvakanyoreswa kana kuti vari kudzidza kuma Non-Formal school, kana kuti vanganzi External Candidates, ndivo chete vanosungirwa kunge vaine zvitupa pabvunzo, kwete vanodzidza musvikoro zviri pasi pehurumende, makanzuru kana mamishoni. Zimbabwe Schools Examinations Council yakazivisa mwedzi wapera kuti vanoda kunyora bvunzo vanofanira kunge vabhadhara mari dzebvunzo musi wa9 Chikunguru uye vano nonoka vanofanira kubhadhara mari iyi musi wa30 Chikungururu. Doctor Zhou vaudza Studio 7 kuti vasina kukwanisa kutora zvitupa nezuro vachinenguva yekutora zvitupa izvi sezvo pachine nguva pazonosvika 30 Chikunguru. Vatiwo Covid-19 inogona kukanganisa kunyorwa kwebvunzo idzi uye semaonero avo, gore rino vana vachafoira zvakanyanya sezvo vasina nguva yekudzidza yakakwana uye varairidzi vasiri kudzidzisa nekuti havasi kufara nemihoro yavanotambira. Hurumende yakambomisa kuvhurwa kwezvikoro nekuti Covid-19 iri kupararira zvakanyanya. No media source currently available

column2: Kubviswa kweLockdown Kuchanetsa Sezvo Vanhu Vakawanda Vasati Vaongororwa Covid-19
column3: Sangano ravanachiremba vanorwira kodzero dzevanhu reZimbabwe Association of Doctors for Human Rights rinoti danho rekuwedzera kana kusawedzera mazuva ekuti nyika irambe yakavharwa, richanetsa kutora sezvo vanhu vazhinji munyika vasina kuongororwa kuti vane chirwere cheCovid-19 here kana kuti kwete. Izvi zvinoitika apo hurumende ichiti yave kutora matanho matsva ekuti vanhu vakawanda vaongororwe, zvikuru vari munzvimbo dzine vanhu vakabatwa neCovid-19. MuZimbabwe mava nevanhu makumi maviri nevatatu vabatwa nechirwere ichi, uye vanhu vatatu vafa nacho, asi pasi rose riine vanhu vanodarika zviuru zana nemakumi maviri nezvinomwe vafa neCovid-19 kubva zvayakatanga kuChina gore rapera. Munyori musangano iri, Doctor Norman Matara, vaudza Studio7 ruzhinji rwevanhu munyika harwuna kuongororwa kuti rwune chirwere cheCovid-19 here kana kuti kwete panguva iyo nyika yakavharwa kwemazuva makumi maviri nerimwe akatarwa nemutungamiri wenyika zvichaita kuti hurumende itemeseke musoro kuti nyika yoramba yakavharwa here kana kuti kwete pachapera nguva yakatarwa naVaEmmerson Mnangagwa. Pari zvino, bazi rezvehutano rinoti raongorora vanhu mazana matanhatu nemakumi matanhatu nevashanu chetekuti vane chirwere ichi here kana kuti Havana munyika ine vanhu vanodarika mamiriyoni gumi nematanhatu. Nekuda kweizvi, VaMatara vati zvinonetsa kuti hurumende itore danho rine hudzamu isina humbowo hwakati tsvikiti hwekuti zvinhu zvakamira sei munyika pamusoro pechirwere ichi. Vaimbove gurukota rezvehutano uye vari munyori wezvehutano muMDC, Doctor Henry Madzorera, vanoti huwandu hwevanhu vaongororwa kusvika pari zvino hunoratidza kuti kuvharwa kwakaitwa nyika hakuna chakwabatsira. Mutauriri wesangano reCrisis in Zimbabwe Coalition, VaMarvelous Khumalo, vakurudzirawo mutungamiri wenyika, VaEmmerson Mnangagwa, kuti vambomira kufamba-famba kwavari kuita. Asi VaMnangagwa vanoti vari pakati pahurongwa hwekutenderera nenyika yose vachiona mamiriro akaita zvinhu pamusoro pechirwere cheCovid-19 ichi uye kuona kuti veruzhinji vari kutevedzera here kurudziro yavo yekuti veruzhinji vagare kudzimba senzira yekuderedza kuapararira kwechirwere ichi. VaMnangagwa vakazivisa kutivachazoongorora pakupera kwemazuva makumi maviri nerimwe avakatara kuti veruzhinji vange vari kudzimba senzira yekuderedza mikana yekupararira kwechirwere ichi kuti zvinokodzera here kuti veruzhinji varambe vari mudzimba kana kuti kwete. Hatina kukwanisa kutaura negurukota rezvehutano, VaObediah Moyo, sezvo vanga vasiri kudaira nharembozha yavo. Asi munyori mubazi ravo, Doctor Agnes Mahomva, vaburitsa mashoko ekuti komiti yakaumbwa nemutungamiri wenyika kuti itungamire nyaya dzekurwisa chirwere che Coronavirus yeInter-Ministerial Taskforce on Covid-19 inotungamirwa nemumwe wevatevedzeri vemutungamiri wenyika, VaKembo Mohadi, yakabvumirana kuti patorwe matanho akasimba ekuti vanhu vazhinji munyika vaongororwe kuti havana chirwere cheCvoid-19 here. Gwaro raburitswa naDoctor Mahomva iri rinoti vanhu vese vanga vachienda kumabasa panguva iyo nyika yanga yakavharwa, kunyanya vashandi vehurumende, vachaongororwa kuti havana kutapukirwa nechirwere ichi here. Doctor Mahomva vati munhu wese anofungidzirwa kuti ane chirwere ichi anosungirwa kuongororwa, uye vose vari kupinda munyika vachibva kunyika dzine chirwere ichi pamwe nevane zvirwere zvedzihwa vanofanira kuongororwa zvakare. Doctor Mahomva vatiwo vanhu vakwegura vane makore makumi matanhatu zvichikwira vari muzvipatara vane zvirwere zvakaita se asthma, shuga, BP, nezvirwere zvemoyo vanofanirawo kuongororwa zvakare. Vati zvose izvi zvichaitwa kuti hurumende inyatsoziva kuti nyika yakamira papi chaizvo pachirwere cheCovid-19. Pari zvino, chirwere cheCovid-19, icho chakatangira kuChina, chinonzi nehurumende chauraya vanhu vatatu munyika, uye kubata vanhu gumi nevasere, ukuwo pasi rose, vanhu vanosvika mamiriyoni maviri vabatwa neCovid-19, uye vanhu vanodarika zviuru zana nemakumi maviri nezvonomwe, vafa nechirwere ichi pasi rose. No media source currently available

column2: Mutambo wakandikoshera, anodaro Sikandar Raza
column3: CHIKWATA checricket chemaChevrons chiri kupinda mu”hondo” svondo rino apo chichatatsurana nePakistan mumitambo mitanhatu inoti mitatu yeOne Day International series (ODI) nemimwe mitatu zvakare yeT20 International.   Mitambo iyi ndeyekutanga yeSuper League iro richangoparurwa uye yekurwira kuenda kumakwikwi e2023 International Cricket Council (ICC) World Cup achaitirwa kuIndia.   Mutambi wemaChevrons, Sikandar Raza, uyo akazvarirwa kunyika yePakistan anoti ari kutarisira zvikuru mutambo uyu uye sechikwata vanoda kukunda sezvo shuviro yavo iri yekuenda kuWorld Cup.   Mumakwikwi ekupedzisira eWorld Cup ayo akaitwa mugore ra2019, maChevrons akakundikana kuenda kunokwikwidza kuEngland neWales mushure mekunge akundwa mumitambo yekurwira tikiti rekuenda kumutambo uyu.   “Toda kushanda nesimba kuti tiende kuWorld Cup.   Chishuvo chedu kuti tihwine mitambo yeSuper League tibve taenda kuWorld Cup. Hatisi kuda zvekuzotamba mimwe mitambo nekuti paWorld Cup yekupedzisira takatadziswa kuenda nemaruns maviri chaiwo. Saka zvinhu zvakatirwadza kutadza kuenda kumitambo iyi apa isu taitamba cricket yepamusoro-soro,” anodaro Raza   Raza, uyo akazvarirwa kuPakistan asi akazokurira muZimbabwe, anoti mutambo wezvikwata zviviri izvi unoreva zvakawanda kwaari sezvo uchange uri wenyika mbiri dziri pamwoyo wake.   “Ndinoyemura zvikuru nzvimbo ino. Ndiri chizvarwa chekuPakistan asi ndichitambira Zimbabwe saka zvinhu zvinondifadza kudzoka kumusha kuzotamba mutambo uyu.   “Chinhu chakanyanyonakisa ndechekuti nyika mbiri idzi, Pakistan neZimbabwe, dzose dzakanditambira zvandiri,” anodaro Raza.   Mutambo wekutanga wePakistan nemaChevrons uriko nemusi weChishanu chino uye wechipiri uchizotambwa musi wa1 Mbudzi kozoti wechitatu musi wa3 Mbudzi.   Mitambo iyi ichange iri yeODI uye ichingopera chete mitambo yeT20 yobva yatanga musi wa7, 8 na10 Mbudzi.   Mitambo yeSuper League ichange iine nyika 13 dzichibandana kurwira kuenda ku2023 India World Cup. Zvikwata zvinomwe zvichapedza zviri pamusoro pamwe chete neIndia zvinobva zvatowaniswa tikiti rekuenda kuWorld Cup.   Zvimwe zvishanu zvacho zvinenge zvasara zvichazotatsurana mumutambo uchazorongwa pachitsvagwa zvikwata zviviri izvo zvinozotevera zvimwe zvisere zvagara zvinenge zvatobudirira kuenda kuWorld Cup.

column2: Nyakupfura VaPatrick Kombayi Muna 1990, VaChivamba, Vanoshaya
column3: Mutevedzeri wasachigaro weZanu-PF mudunhu reMidlands Province, VaKizito Chivamba, avo vange vari nhengo yeparamende inomirira Chiwundura, vakashaya kuchipatara cheGweru nemusi weChitatu. VaChivamba vakatanga kuva nhengo yeZanu muna 1972 uye vanoti vainge vari mujibha kubva muna 1977 kusvika muna 1979. Vange vari nhengo yeparamende kubva muna 2008. Mufi anonzi ange arwara kwenguva yakareba. Kunyange hazvo veZanu-PF mudunhu iri vari kuchema vachiti vaive gamba, vamwe vanopikisa vanoti nyaya yavo yekupfura muchakabvu Patrick Kombayi vachibatsirana naVaElias Kanengoni musori, avo vakaitwa gamba renyika munongedzo wekuti muZimbabwe hamuna hutongo hwejekerere. Muna 1990 munguva yesarudzo, VaChivamba naVaKanengoni vakapfura VaKombayi vainge vari kubato reZimbabwe Unity Movement. VaKombayi vaikwikwidzana nevaimbova mutevedzeri wemutungamiri wenyika mushakabvu Simon Muzenda kuGweru. Dare repamusoro soro rakavatongera kugara mujeri kwemakore manomwe asi mutungamiri wenyika, VaRobert Mugabe, vakabva vavaregerera vachishandisa masimba avo semutungamiri wenyika. Munguva yehondo yeChimurenga, VaKombayi vaibatsira zvikuru varwiri verusununguko vainge vari kuZambia. Gweta rinorwira kodzero dzevanhu, VaDewa Mavhinga, avo vanoshanda nesangano reHuman Rights Watch, vanoti tsika yehurumende yeZanu-PF yekuregerera vanotyora kodzero dzevanhu iri kudzosera hutongo hwejekerere kumashure. No media source currently available

column2: Tsiva yakandidzidzisa kuzvibata: Makumbe
column3: SHASHA yakambonetsa mutsiva yechidzimai, Diana Makumbe, anoti mutambo uyu wakamubatsira chaizvo kuti akwanise kuchengeta amai vake nevekumhuri yavo mushure mekunge akundikana kuchikoro.   Makumbe, uyo parizvino ave muridzi wepembe najudge wetsiva, mumwe weshasha dzechidzimai dzakaita mukurumbira munyika muno izvo zvakamuona achihwina mitambo 23 achikundwa mumwechete muboka reAmateur.   Asi, paakazoenda padanho repamusoro reProfessional akakwanisa kuhwina mitambo mitatu chete pa15 yaakatamba ndokukundwa mipfumbamwe, achiita mangange katatu.   Pakukura kwake, Makumbe aive nembiri yekumhanya mumakwikwi emujaho zvekuti anoti vamwe vanhu vaimukurudzira kuti aende kuchiuto.   Anoti paakakundikana bvunzo dzake dzeO-Level, ndipo paakatanga kutamba tsiva ndokuzoenda kuArmy School Sports uko akanotamba tsiva zvakare achiedza kuti zvimwe angagone kupinda basa rehusoja.   “Ndichikura, ndaida chaizvo kuita musoja nekuti ndakakura ndiri shasha pamujaho wekumhanya uye vanhu vaindiona vaitoti kwandiri kana wakura enda kuchisoja unogona kupinda basa saka ndaida chaizvo kuita musoja.   “Zvose zvakazoshanduka pandisina kubuda zvakanaka pabvunzo dzangu izvo zvakazondituma kuti nditange kukwikwidza mutsiva.   “Mutambo uyu wakandibatsira chaizvo nekuti ndakange ndave kukwanisa kuchengeta amai vangu uye nevekumhuri kwavanobva,” anodaro.   Makumbe anoti paakange ave kukwikwidza pachidanho cheProfessional, akasangana nezvakawanda zvinosanganisira kubirirwa achinzi akundwa mumutambo asi iye ahwinha izvo zvakaita kuti asvike pakuramwa kutamba tsiva.   Mutambo wake wekupedzisira waive mugore ra2016 paakasangana naEllen Simwaka wekuMalawi apo akakundwa.   Anoti tsiva yakamudzidzisa kuzvibata muhupenyu hwake izvo nanhasi zvinomubatsira pane zvose zvaanoita.   “Tsiva izere nekubirira uye unobirirwa kuti ukundwe zvigobatsira kugadzira zita remumwe mutambi uyo mapuromota vanenge vachida kuti asimukire.   “Saka ini ndizvo zvimwe zvakandituma kuti ndichisiya tsiva nekuti ndakange ndaneta kubirirwa apa unenge uchipihwa mari isingatenge futi,” anodaro Makumbe.   Anoti basa rake semuridzi wepembe najudge wetsiva riri kumuona achienda kune dzimwe nyika dzakaita seZambia achinoridza kumitambo yeko.   MuZimbabwe, Makumbe aridza pembe pamwe nekuve judge pamitambo yevatambi vetsiva vakasiyana vanosanganisira Charles Manyuchi.   Anoti anoda kushandura tsiva pamwe nekusimudzira vatambi vanenge vachibirirwa kuti vasabirirwe.   “Ndave muridzi wepembe uye judge wetsiva saka ndinoda chaizvo kuti ndiridze mutambo uyu zvisina kubirira mukati. Vamwe varidzi vepembe vanobirira vachida kufadza puromota, manje ini handiite izvozvo.   “Saka ndinoona kunge ndizvo zvakatuma vekuZambia kuti vandishevedze kuzoridza pamutambo waEmily Kubwalo wemuno uyo akarwa naCatherine Mulyata wekuZambia munaZvita,” anodaro.   Kubva achisendeka zvekurwa tsiva, Makumbe anoti akapinda zvekare mune zvemhanzi uye ari kuridza musambo wembira nechikwata cheBlack Survivors.   Anoti vanotarisira kuparura dambarefu ravo rekutanga nguva pfupi inotevera.   Makumbe akakomborerwa nemwanasikana ane makore 14 okuberwekwa uyo waanoti ane zvipo zvemitambo yakasiyana uye parizvino anokwikwidza mumujaho nekutamba nhabvu yevasikana.   “Vana havadi kuudzirwa zvekuita. Isu tinofanirwa kuvarakidza gwara chete tichivakurudzira kuita zvese mitambo nekudzidza. Dzidzo ndiyo inofanirwa kuenda pekutanga zvimwe zvese zvozotevera,” anodaro Makumbe.

column2: Vamwe Vatungamiri veMapato Anopikisa Vokurudzira Vanhu Kuti Vabayiwe Nhomba yeCovid-19
column3: Mutungamiri webato rinopikisa, reLabour, Economists and Democrats (LEAD), Muzvare Linda Masarira, vanoti vari kukurudzira vana veZimbabwe kuti vasatarisa denda reCovid-19 sedambudziko renyika yeZimbabwe chete izvo zvinozoita kuti varitarise neziso rezvematongerwo enyika. Muzvare Masararira, avo vakave mumwe wevatungamiri vemapato anopikisa vakabatana nemutungamiri wenyika, VaEmmerson Mnangagwa, pakuparurwa kwechikamu chechipiri chekubaiwa kwenhomba yeSinopharm, yekudzivirira Covid-19 kuVictoria Falls nezuro, vanotiwo kunyange hazvo vana veZimbabwe vaine kodzero yekusarudza chakavanakira, zvakakoshawo kuti vasarudze kuzvidzvirira kubva kuchirwere ichi kuburikidza nekubaiwa nhomba iyi. Mutungamiri weMDC-T, VaDouglas Mwonzora, ndemumwe wevatungamiri vanopikisa vakavewo pachiitiko ichi. VaMnangagwa vakatora mukana uyu kubaiwawo nhomba yavo yekutanga, pamwechete negurukota rezvekudzviririrwa kwenyika, Amai Oppah Muchinguri-Kashiri, naMuzvare Masarira. VaMwonzora vakabaiwawo nhomba yavo yepiri kuWilkins muHarare nezuro wakare. No media source currently available

column2: Iran Inorwisa Mizinda Inogara Mauto eAmerica muIraq
column3: Iran yakakanda zvombo zvema ’missiles’ zvinopfuura gumi nezviviri kumizinda inogara mauto eAmerica mu Iraq neChipiri manheru. Asi hazvisati zvazivikanwa kana paine mauto aurayiwa kana akuvadzwa. Iran inoti yaita izvi senzira yekutsiva kuurayiwa neAmerica kwakaitwa General Qassem Soleimani svondo rapera. Muzinda mukuru wemauto eAmerica, we Pentagon, pamwe chete nemuzinda wemutungamiri wenyika, weWhite House, yazivisa kuti haisi kuzotaura pamusoro penyaya iyi nevatori venhau sezvo mutungamiri wenyika, VaDonald Trump, vachataura kune veruzhinji.. VaTrump Asi vanyora paTwitter pavo kuti zvinhu zvese zvakanaka, vachiti vachataura kuvanhu pamusoro pezvenyaya iyi nemusi weChitatu. Nhengo yeZanu PF muWashington DC, VaFrenk Guni, avo vari kutevera kufamba kuri kuita nyaya iyi nguva dzese, vanoti America inofanira kuziva kuti kana ikatanga hondo neIran, inofanira kuziva kuti hondo yacho haiperi sezvatiri kuona muIraq neAfghanistan. No media source currently available
